title: Honey Balloon
summaries: The Honey Balloon is an accessory that combines the functions of a Shiny Red Balloon and a Honey Comb. It boosts jump height by 33% and jump speed by 30%, increasing your first jump's height to ~10Â½ blocks (~75% increase), while oddly reducing it when underwater, from 8 blocks-to 7 blocks, and releases a small swarm of angry bees when the player is hurt, which seek out and deal small amounts of damage to enemies. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it also grants the Honey buff after being damaged.
